description: This table contains information about queries sent to retrieve financial information for patients and/or patient contacts in a financial assistance case record.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the note record.

columns.name: QUERY_PERSON_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record who triggered the query. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: QUERY_DATE
columns.description: The date when the query was triggered.

columns.name: QUERY_TRIGGER_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The trigger source category ID for the query.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


User


Background Process


Batch Job
